author: nmalin
msg: Migrate findParty.ftl to form widgets, related issue OFBIZ-6227. Added a new service performFindParty oriented only on search operation (do not contains screen information that managed by screen widget) and convert the FindParty form to works very similar of the older but with widget capacity. Thanks Gil Portenseigne for this issue

author: adrianc
msg: Restored the  'request-confirmation' and 'confirmation-message' menu item attributes that were removed in the recent widget refactoring - https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6334.

author: rfscholte
msg: removed repositoryId and repositoryUrl from 'get' goal

author: veithen
msg: Reintegrate branch attr-aspects. This unifies attribute and namespace declaration handling in LLOM and DOOM. Attribute and namespace declarations are now stored in a simple linked list and the code is shared between LLOM and DOOM.
